amendment.description: An amendment numbered 78 printed in House Report 114-683 to remove federal protections for the Mexican Wolf under the Endangered Species Act (ESA) and would prevent the expansion of the species habitat outside of its historic range.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 78 printed in House Report 114-683 to remove federal protections for the Mexican Wolf under the Endangered Species Act (ESA) and would prevent the expansion of the species habitat outside of its historic range.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A064) Agreed to by recorded vote: 219 - 203 (Roll no. 454).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A064) Agreed to by recorded vote: 219 - 203 (Roll no. 454).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A064) offered by Mr. Gosar.
